<a id="CollisionShape3D"></a>

# CollisionShape3D

**Inherits:** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A node that provides a [Shape3D](Shape3D.md) to a [CollisionObject3D](CollisionObject3D.md) parent.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A node that provides a [Shape3D](Shape3D.md) to a [CollisionObject3D](CollisionObject3D.md) parent and allows to edit it. This can give a detection shape to an [Area3D](Area3D.md) or turn a [PhysicsBody3D](PhysicsBody3D.md) into a solid object.

\ **Warning:** A non-uniformly scaled **CollisionShape3D** will likely not behave as expected. Make sure to keep its scale the same on all axes and adjust its [shape](CollisionShape3D.md#CollisionShape3D_property_shape) resource instead.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="CollisionShape3D_property_debug_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **debug_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#CollisionShape3D_property_debug_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_debug_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_debug_color**\ (\ )

The collision shape color that is displayed in the editor, or in the running project if **Debug &gt; Visible Collision Shapes** is checked at the top of the editor.

\ **Note:** The default value is [ProjectSettings.debug/shapes/collision/shape_color](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_debug/shapes/collision/shape_color). The ``Color(0, 0, 0, 0)`` value documented here is a placeholder, and not the actual default debug color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CollisionShape3D_property_debug_fill"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **debug_fill** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#CollisionShape3D_property_debug_fill)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_debug_fill**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_enable_debug_fill**\ (\ )

If ``true``, when the shape is displayed, it will show a solid fill color in addition to its wireframe.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CollisionShape3D_property_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **disabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CollisionShape3D_property_disabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_disabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_disabled**\ (\ )

A disabled collision shape has no effect in the world. This property should be changed with [Object.set_deferred()](Object.md#Object_method_set_deferred).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CollisionShape3D_property_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Shape3D](Shape3D.md) **shape** [ðŸ”—](#CollisionShape3D_property_shape)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shape**\ (\ value\: [Shape3D](Shape3D.md)\ )
- [Shape3D](Shape3D.md) **get_shape**\ (\ )

The actual shape owned by this collision shape.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="CollisionShape3D_method_make_convex_from_siblings"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **make_convex_from_siblings**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CollisionShape3D_method_make_convex_from_siblings)

Sets the collision shape's shape to the addition of all its convexed [MeshInstance3D](MeshInstance3D.md) siblings geometry.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CollisionShape3D_method_resource_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **resource_changed**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](Resource.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#CollisionShape3D_method_resource_changed)

**Deprecated:** Use [Resource.changed](Resource.md#Resource_signal_changed) instead.

This method does nothing.
